thread.title: Fitch says fiscal, political issues weigh on Brazil rating
thread.title_full: Fitch says fiscal, political issues weigh on Brazil rating | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Fitch says fiscal, political issues weigh on Brazil rating
text: RIO DE JANEIRO Aug 21 Brazil's tense political environment and slowing economy, combined with a reduced government savings target and worrying debt dynamics, are putting additional pressure on the country's sovereign debt rating, Fitch Ratings' Brazil head Rafael Guedes said at an event in Rio de Janeiro on Friday. (Reporting by Rodrigo Viga Gaier; Editing by Bernadette Baum )
